Posts.Content: Hi there, I wanted to ask about the right time to take aspirin after mastactomy.  I already had six cycles of chemo and about to start radiotherapy.  I read that taking aspirin after surgery would help in prevent recurrence of cancer again.
Posts.Title: Aspirin after mastactomy

Posts.Content: Thanks darling.  I actually asked my onco and she did not recommend it  as i had a good response with chemo.  She is worried taking aspirin could confluct with chemo that still in my body.  That's what she said.
Posts.Title: Aspirin after mastactomy
